participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative with a passion for music and animals.
participant_1.background: I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others. I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong. I played football in college. Yes, I have four dogs. I like to visit websites that have information about my allergies and trophies.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and protective, with a strong sense of duty towards family and country.
participant_2.background: I think it's cool that I'm able to serve my country and protect my family. I am allergic to dust. My family owns a farm. I went to college and graduated few years ago. I'm not a fan of my singing voice, but I love to dye my hair different colors.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Good, what about you?
Doing alright, thanks for asking!
What have you been up to lately?
I've been spending a lot of time with my partner and our dogs. We've also been watching a lot of movies lately.
That sounds fun, I've been pretty busy with work. I'm in the military and I just got back from a deployment.
Oh wow, that's a lot of work. But I'm sure it was also a rewarding experience.
It was, I'm glad I was able to serve my country.
That's awesome, I'm sure your family is proud of you.
Thanks, they are. What did you do in college?
I studied business and marketing.
Oh cool, what do you do for work now?
I'm a marketing manager at a small company.
That sounds like a great job, I'm happy for you.
Thanks! I'm pretty happy with it too.
Do you have any other hobbies besides music?
I like to play video games and I'm a big fan of football.
Oh cool, I like video games too. What's your favorite game?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Oh wow, that's a great game. I've never played it, but I've heard good things about it.
Yeah, it's really fun. I've put a lot of hours into it.
I'll have to check it out sometime.
You definitely should, it's a lot of fun.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem, anytime
